scene: Beach gym confrontation - Venice Beach - 1987 DAWN

camera_position.starts: Wide shot showing Rex and Solly facing off
camera_position.ends: Low angle on Solly after Rex falls

environment.primary_location: Muscle Beach outdoor gym at sunrise
environment.view: Pull-up bars, concrete weights, ocean behind

REX_ARMSTRONG.physique: 300 LBS of PURE MUSCLE, veins like cables
REX_ARMSTRONG.wardrobe: TINY RED SHORTS, combat boots, NO SHIRT
REX_ARMSTRONG.appearance: Every muscle group ENORMOUS and defined
REX_ARMSTRONG.details: Chest like armor plates, biceps like bowling balls

SOLLY.appearance: Obviously painted black hair, greasy face

action_sequence: Wide shot: Rex stands facing Solly in chair
Rex doing one-arm push-ups, muscles ENORMOUS
REX SPEAKS: 'Solly, I told you - Rex Armstrong is retired!'
Solly doesn't look up from chicken
Solly takes MASSIVE bite of chicken
Rex's veins pop out like 3D maps
Solly finally looks up at Rex
Rex's eyes go wide in shock
Rex does complete BACKFLIP from chicken hit
Rex's huge body spinning in air
SOLLY SPEAKS (mouth full): 'Nobody retires from Solly.'
Low angle: Solly in chair, Rex down in background
Rex groans, tries to get up
Rex's huge muscles covered in sand
FINAL SHOT: Solly eating, Rex defeated in sand

combat_details.impact_emphasis: Rex does full backflip from chicken
final_positions: Rex: Face-down in sand, muscles covered in sand
Solly: Still in chair, still eating

critical_instructions: END WITH: Rex defeated in sand
Rex's TINY RED SHORTS stay perfect
